Action.label: ALL
Action.Str:
cp /data/data/com.xiaomi.hm.health/databases/origin_db_eba7b678edbad2be35ee5b1914572e49 /data/miband/origin_db
cp /data/data/com.xiaomi.hm.health/databases/origin_db_eba7b678edbad2be35ee5b1914572e49-journal /data/miband/origin_db-journal
cd /data/miband
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/vendor/lib*:/system/lib*
/data/miband/sqlite3 origin_db < parse.sql
cp /data/miband/extract.csv /sdcard/data/miband/Mi_Band_Table.csv
cp /data/miband/origin_db /sdcard/data/miband/origin_db_%DATE.db
cp /data/miband/extract.js /sdcard/data/miband/extract.js
cp /data/miband/config.js /sdcard/data/miband/config.js
cp /data/miband/locale.js /sdcard/data/miband/locale.js
cp /data/miband/app_locale.js /sdcard/data/miband/app_locale.js
cp /data/miband/Mi_Band_Table.html /sdcard/data/miband/Mi_Band_Table.html
cp /data/miband/Mi_Band_Graphs.html /sdcard/data/miband/Mi_Band_Graphs.html
rm /data/miband/app_locale.js
rm /data/miband/extract.csv
rm /data/miband/extract.js
rm /data/miband/origin_db
rm /data/miband/origin_db-journal

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%gd_id() File ID Unique ID for the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%gd_name() File Name Name of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%gd_size() File Size Size of the file (in bytes) on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%gd_time() File Time The last time the file was modified by anyone. Expressed in Seconds since Epoch (similar to %TIMES)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%gd_md5() MD5 MD5 checksum of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%gd_mimetype() Mime Type Type of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%gd_uploaded() Uploaded true if file was uploaded, false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%gd_weburl() Web URL URL that can be used to show the file on your Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7></StringArray>
